text:
So... <@UUS6GL8BH> and other users of Kakoune

kakoune doesn't provide auto-indent for julia
The lsp just provides a format option, not auto-indent

I've submitted a PR to kakoune, to implement auto-indent features for julia, but before it gets merged and released.... <https://github.com/mawww/kakoune/pull/4051>
Feel free to copy and paste this to your julia.kak file (`/usr/share/kak/rc/filetype/julia.kak` in linux)
<https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clad26/kakoune/patch-1/rc/filetype/julia.kak>
